column1: Local Foods////The sandwich I got was the gulf shrimp & blue crab sandwich which was delish as the seafood was very fresh-tasting. However
column2: I would say the flavoring of the shrimp & crab could be better as I find the flavoring light. Yes
column4: the better you can taste the freshness of the seafood
column5: but it would hurt to add more flavors. However
column6: I did enjoy and will consider getting the same again. I also want to go back and try the other sandwiches which all now have high expectations!
